component.name: Configuration Factory
component.definition: Creates an instance of the OpenEjbConfiguration class that contains all the data and configuration information the Classic assembler needs to construct the container system. The object structure in the OpenEjbConfiguration class is refered to as the InfoObjects. The Configuration Factory can construct, retreive, or populate the InfoObjects from any data source it chooses or by any means it chooses.
component.responsibility: Creates an instance of the OpenEjbConfiguration
The data in the InfoObjects must be validated and accurately represent the system, services, jars, and beans to be constructed
